document_data.name: Dhaerivus
document_data.mainbody: '''Dhaerivus''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] with dark eyes and a thin white face.
document_data.Description: The mage wore a dark [[tabard]] with glowing mystic signs, and carried a [[staff]] adorned with [[gem]]s and a crystal sphere at one end. He had many rings on his fingers.
document_data.History: Dhaerivus was once turned into a [[toad]] at a [[magefair]].
